title: When was the first multi-story building built? - Quora

response.answer_text: By multi-story you mean more than one floor? Two floors? Ten floors? Ancient civilizations and empires were building buildings with more than one story from the beginning of human habitation in constructed structures (Recommend a visit to the Taos Pueblos in Taos, New Mexico). But climbing stairs to all those floors was no fun. Then came structural steel frames, the elevator and the term”skyscraper” which was initially defined as 10 stories or more. You can find this with a simple search in Wikipedia… Skyscraper - Wikipedia Taos Pueblo - Wikipedia
